verses.verse: Moreover he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, eat <S%H398><s%> that you find <S%H4672><s%>; eat <S%H398><s%> this roll <S%H4039><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
So I opened <S%H6605><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and he caused me to eat <S%H398><s%> that roll <S%H4039><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, cause your belly <S%H990><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>, and fill <S%H4390><s%> your bowels <S%H4578><s%> with this roll <S%H4039><s%> that I give <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H398><s%>. Then did I eat it <S%H6310><s%>; and it was in my mouth as honey <S%H1706><s%> for sweetness <S%H4966><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, go <S%H3212><s%>, get <S%H935><s%> you unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> with my words unto them <S%H1697><s%>.

For you are not sent <S%H7971><s%> to a people <S%H5971><s%> of a strange <S%H6012><s%> speech <S%H8193><s%> and of a hard <S%H3515><s%> language <S%H3956><s%>, but to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

Not to many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of a strange <S%H6012><s%> speech <S%H8193><s%> and of a hard <S%H3515><s%> language <S%H3956><s%>, whose words <S%H1697><s%> you can not understand <S%H8085><s%>. Surely <S%H7971><s%>, had I sent you to them <S%H8085><s%>, they would have listened unto you.

But the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will <S%H14><s%> not listen <S%H8085><s%> unto you <S%H14><s%>; for they will not listen <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H1004><s%>: for all the house of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are impudent <S%H2389><s%> and hardhearted <S%H7186><s%>.

Behold <S%H5414><s%>, I have made your face <S%H6440><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> against <S%H5980><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%>, and your forehead <S%H4696><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> against <S%H5980><s%> their foreheads <S%H4696><s%>.

As a diamond <S%H8068><s%> harder <S%H2389><s%> than flint <S%H6864><s%> have I made <S%H5414><s%> your forehead <S%H4696><s%>: fear <S%H3372><s%> them not <S%H2865><s%>, neither be dismayed at their looks <S%H6440><s%>, though they be a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.

Moreover he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, all my words <S%H1697><s%> that I shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto you receive <S%H3947><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> with your ears <S%H241><s%>.

And go <S%H3212><s%>, get <S%H935><s%> you to them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%>, unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, and tell them <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; whether they will hear <S%H8085><s%>, or whether they will forbear <S%H2308><s%>.

Then the spirit <S%H7307><s%> took me up <S%H5375><s%>, and I heard <S%H8085><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> me a voice <S%H6963><s%> of a great <S%H1419><s%> rushing <S%H7494><s%>, saying <S%H1288><s%>, Blessed be the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> from his place <S%H4725><s%>.

I heard also the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the living creatures <S%H2416><s%> that touched <S%H5401><s%> one <S%H802><s%> another <S%H269><s%>, and the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the wheels <S%H212><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> them <S%H6963><s%>, and a noise of a great <S%H1419><s%> rushing <S%H7494><s%>.

So the spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted me up <S%H5375><s%>, and took me away <S%H3947><s%>, and I went <S%H3212><s%> in bitterness <S%H4751><s%>, in the heat <S%H2534><s%> of my spirit <S%H7307><s%>; but the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was strong upon me <S%H2388><s%>.

Then I came <S%H935><s%> to them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%> at Tel <S%H8512><s%>â€“abib, that lived <S%H3427><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> of Chebar <S%H3529><s%>, and I sat <S%H3427><s%> where they sat <S%H3427><s%>, and remained <S%H3427><s%> there astonished <S%H8074><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.
And it came to pass at the end <S%H7097><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, I have made <S%H5414><s%> you a watchman <S%H6822><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: therefore hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> at my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and give them warning from me <S%H2094><s%>.

When I say <S%H559><s%> unto the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, You shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>; and you give him not warning <S%H2094><s%>, nor speak <S%H1696><s%> to warn <S%H2094><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> from his wicked <S%H7563><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, to save his life <S%H2421><s%>; the same wicked <S%H7563><s%> man shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1245><s%> at your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Yet if you warn <S%H2094><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, and he turn <S%H7725><s%> not from his wickedness <S%H7562><s%>, nor from his wicked <S%H7563><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; but you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%>.

Again <S%H7725><s%>, When a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man does turn <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and commit <S%H6213><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, and I lay <S%H5414><s%> a stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H4191><s%>, he shall die: because you have not given him warning <S%H2094><s%>, he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his sin <S%H2403><s%>, and his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> which he has done <S%H6213><s%> shall not be remembered <S%H2142><s%>; but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1245><s%> at your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Nevertheless if you warn <S%H2094><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H6662><s%>, that the righteous sin <S%H2398><s%> not <S%H2398><s%>, and he does not sin, he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>, because he is warned <S%H2094><s%>; also you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%>.

And the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was there upon me <S%H559><s%>; and he said unto me <S%H6965><s%>, Arise, go forth <S%H3318><s%> into the plain <S%H1237><s%>, and I will there talk with you <S%H1696><s%>.

Then I arose <S%H6965><s%>, and went forth <S%H3318><s%> into the plain <S%H1237><s%>: and <S%H3519><s%>, behold, the glory of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> there <S%H3519><s%>, as the glory which I saw <S%H7200><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> of Chebar <S%H3529><s%>: and I fell <S%H5307><s%> on my face <S%H6440><s%>.

Then the spirit <S%H7307><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> into me <S%H5975><s%>, and set me upon my feet <S%H7272><s%>, and spoke <S%H1696><s%> with me <S%H559><s%>, and said unto me <S%H935><s%>, Go, shut <S%H5462><s%> yourself inside <S%H8432><s%> your house <S%H1004><s%>.

But you <S%H1121><s%>, O son of man <S%H120><s%>, behold <S%H5414><s%>, they shall put bands <S%H5688><s%> upon you <S%H631><s%>, and shall bind you with them <S%H3318><s%>, and you shall not go out among them <S%H8432><s%>:

And I will make your tongue <S%H3956><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> to the roof of your mouth <S%H2441><s%>, that you shall be mute <S%H481><s%>, and shall not be to them a reprover <S%H376><s%>: for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.

But when I speak <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you <S%H6605><s%>, I will open your mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and you shall say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; He that hears <S%H8085><s%>, let him hear <S%H8085><s%>; and he that forbears <S%H2310><s%>, let him forbear <S%H2308><s%>: for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.
